text:
Street markings are being unveiled across the West Midlands to help people follow social distancing guidelines.

BBC

Flower markers have been chosen to brighten up Leamington Spa and have been placed at two-metre intervals around the town centre.

In Birmingham, a 60-metre stretch of Broad Street has been marked out for when businesses in the area are allowed to reopen.

In both cases, the local Business Improvement Districts (BID) have been behind the schemes.
